+        /**

+        /**

+        /**

+    }
 
 	/**
-	 * Type of restriction

-	 * @see get_type()
-	 */

-
-	/**
-	 * Restricted values

-	 */

-
-	/**

-	{

-		$this->type = $type;
-		$this->value = $value;
-	}
-
-	/**
 	 * String-ified version
 	 *
 	 * @return string
 	 */

+	public function __toString(): string
 	{
 		// There is no $this->data here
 		return md5(serialize($this));
